segments.text: Will you be joining Billy and I at the Bar ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which one will you be going to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are going to try the new one that opened up on 17th Street .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I've been meaning to visit that place myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to stop off at my apartment to get changed so I should be there by 9 pm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , can I bring a date with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . But if there are going to be four of us , I had better make reservations .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . that is a very good idea . It would be a shame if we could not find a place to sit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then I'II make reservations for 9 pm for a party of four .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll be there . Oh , is there a cover charge at the bar ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not that I know of . Why do you ask ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to make sure I bring enough money for my date and I .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hear the drinks and food there are moderately priced.You should be fine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One last question.Is there a dress code there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , its very casual there . Leave your jacket and tie at home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perfect . I wanted to have a casual evening tonight .
segments.speaker: S2
